amendment.description: Amendment sought to restore the ARPA-E goal of developing energy technologies that result in reductions in energy-related emissions, including greenhouse gases.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 11 printed in part A of House Report 114-120 to remove `reductions of energy-related emissions, including greenhouse gases' from goals of ARPA-E.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Beyer amendment (A011) Failed by recorded vote: 190 - 232 (Roll no. 256).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Beyer amendment (A011) Failed by recorded vote: 190 - 232 (Roll no. 256).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A011) offered by Mr. Beyer.
